title: ISSS624_AGA
text:
Welcome to my Applied Geospatial Analysis Website.
I will be sharing my learning journey with you.

title: Hands-on Exercise 1: Geospatial Data Wrangling with R
text: In this hands-on exercise, I will learn how to import and wrangle geospatial data using appropriate R packages.

title: Hands-on Exercise 1: Geospatial Data Wrangling with R
text:
Getting Started
The code chunk below install and load sf and tidyverse packages into R environment.

pacman::p_load(sf, tidyverse)

title: Hands-on Exercise 1: Geospatial Data Wrangling with R
text:
Importing Geospatial data

Importing polygon feature data
st_read() is a func from sf package, used to read files in shapefile format.
dsn- data source name

mpsz <- st_read(dsn="data/geospatial", layer = "MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL")

Reading layer `MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL' from data source 
  `C:\yixin-neo\ISSS624_AGA\Hands-on_Ex1\data\geospatial' using driver `ESRI Shapefile'
Simple feature collection with 323 features and 15 fields
Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON
Dimension:     XY
Bounding box:  xmin: 2667.538 ymin: 15748.72 xmax: 56396.44 ymax: 50256.33
Projected CRS: SVY21
